title: Sky Ring
description: Shoot up a sky-high tower for a birds-eye view of Wonderla Kochi!

title: Recoil
description: India's first-ever action-packed reverse looping roller coaster ride!

title: Thunder Mountain
description: Race through an abandoned mine on this thrilling roller coaster adventure!

title: Gravity Defier
description: Experience weightlessness as you drop from 100 feet in the air!

title: Tornado Twister
description: Spin and twist through this high-speed thrill ride that will leave you breathless!

title: Jungle Safari
description: Journey through a wild jungle terrain on this exciting off-road adventure!

title: Mission Interstellar
description: Blast through cosmic chaos on a wild, out-of-this-world space ride!

title: Equinox
description: A thrill monster that spins you 360 degrees in a giant circle!

title: Tsunami Wave
description: Ride the massive waves in India's largest wave pool!

title: Rapid River
description: Navigate through white water rapids on this exciting river adventure!

title: Aqua Loop
description: Experience the thrill of a 360-degree loop on this water slide!

title: Splash Mountain
description: Plunge down a 50-foot drop into a refreshing pool of water!

title: Mini Express
description: A gentle train ride perfect for little adventurers!

title: Bumper Cars
description: Fun-filled bumper car experience for the whole family!

title: Merry-Go-Round
description: Classic carousel ride with beautifully painted horses for the little ones!

title: Balloon Race
description: Colorful hot air balloons that gently rise and spin for young riders!

title: Kiddie Coaster
description: A small roller coaster designed specifically for children's first thrill ride!

title: Wonderland
description: Interactive play area with slides, ball pits, and climbing structures!
